Uses of Class
arma.Op

    • Uses of Op in arma

      Methods in arma that return Op 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Op Op.valueOf(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static Op[] Op.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
      Methods in arma with parameters of type Op 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Mat.at(int i, int j, Op operation, double operand)
      Performs a right-hand side operation on the value of the element at the nth row and jth column.
      void Mat.at(int n, Op operation, double operand)
      Performs a right-hand side operation on the value of the nth element of a column-major-ordered one-dimensional view of the matrix.
      void Mat.col(int j, Op operation, double operand)
      Performs a right-hand side element-wise operation on all elements of the jth column.
      void Mat.col(int j, Op operation, Mat operand)
      Performs a right-hand side element-wise operation on all elements of the jth column.
      void Mat.diag(Op operation, double operand)
      Performs a right-hand side element-wise operation on all elements on the main diagonal.
      void Mat.diag(Op operation, Mat operand)
      Performs a right-hand side element-wise operation on all elements on the main diagonal.
      void Mat.each_col(Op operation, double operand)
      Performs the provided right-hand side element-wise operation on each column.
      void Mat.each_col(Op operation, Mat operand)
      Performs the provided right-hand side element-wise operation on each column.
      void Mat.each_row(Op operation, double operand)
      Performs the provided right-hand side element-wise operation on each row.
      void Mat.each_row(Op operation, Mat operand)
      Performs the provided right-hand side element-wise operation on each row.
      void Mat.elem(Mat selection, Op operation, double operand)
      Performs the provided right-hand side element-wise operation on all elements for which selection.at(n) > 0 holds.
      void Mat.elem(Mat selection, Op operation, Mat operand)
      Performs the provided right-hand side element-wise operation on all elements for which selection.at(n) > 0 holds.
      static Mat Arma.find(double a, Op operation, Mat b) 
      static Mat Arma.find(Mat a, Op operation, double b) 
      static Mat Arma.find(Mat a, Op operation, Mat b) 
      void Mat.row(int i, Op operation, double operand)
      Performs a right-hand side element-wise operation on all elements of the ith row.
      void Mat.row(int i, Op operation, Mat operand)
      Performs a right-hand side element-wise operation on all elements of the ith row.
